mapper.sql: id, equipment_id, public_user_id, target_user_id, order_status_id, insert_time, description, reason, problem_time, handle_time, handle_result, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_order
order by ${orderByClause}

select id,description,equipment_id,equipment_name,handle_result,handle_time, problem_time,insert_time,order_status_id,order_status_name, public_user_id,public_username,reason,remark,target_user_id, target_username from ( SELECT tor.id, tor.description, tor.equipment_id, te.`name` as equipment_name, tor.handle_result, tor.handle_time, tor.problem_time, tor.insert_time, tor.order_status_id, tors.status_name as order_status_name, tor.public_user_id, ptu.username as public_username, tor.reason, tor.remark, tor.target_user_id, ttu.username as target_username from t_order tor left join t_user ptu on tor.public_user_id = ptu.id left join t_user ttu on tor.target_user_id = ttu.id left join t_order_status tors on tor.order_status_id = tors.id left join t_equipment te on tor.equipment_id = te.id ) lin
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_order
id,
equipment_id,
public_user_id,
target_user_id,
order_status_id,
insert_time,
description,
reason,
problem_time,
handle_time,
handle_result,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{publicUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{targetUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orderStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{problemTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_order
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
equipment_id = #{record.equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
public_user_id = #{record.publicUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
target_user_id = #{record.targetUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_status_id = #{record.orderStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
insert_time = #{record.insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reason = #{record.reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
problem_time = #{record.problemTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handle_time = #{record.handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handle_result = #{record.handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_order set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, equipment_id = #{record.equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, public_user_id = #{record.publicUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, target_user_id = #{record.targetUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_status_id = #{record.orderStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, insert_time = #{record.insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{record.reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, problem_time = #{record.problemTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, handle_time = #{record.handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, handle_result = #{record.handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_order
equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
public_user_id = #{publicUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
target_user_id = #{targetUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_status_id = #{orderStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
problem_time = #{problemTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handle_time = #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handle_result = #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_order set equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, public_user_id = #{publicUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, target_user_id = #{targetUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_status_id = #{orderStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, problem_time = #{problemTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, handle_time = #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, handle_result = #{handleResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
